text: New Taipei City () is a city in northern Taiwan. It circles Taipei City. It is south of Keelung, north of Taoyuan City and west of Yilan County. It is a part of the Republic of China and the largest city in Taiwan. * Mayor: Hou You-yi () * Total Area: 2,052.5667 km² * Total people: 3,743,553 (April,2006) == Government == New Taipei City controls 29 districts (區). It has 1,017 villages (里). The villages are divided into 21,683 neighborhoods (鄰).
